Package org.glassfish.webservices.monitoring

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationListener
    This interface allows to register interest in authentication events in the web service container.
    Endpoint
    This interface defines all information and behaviour accessible from a particular endpoint.
    EndpointLifecycleListener
    This listener interface provides facility to receive notifications when a new Web Service endpoint has been added/removed to/from the appserver runtime.
    GlobalMessageListener
    This interface permits implementors to register a global message listener which will be notified for all the web services requests and responses on installed and enabled Web Services.
    HttpRequestInfo  
    HttpResponseInfo  
    MessageListener
    This listener interface provides ability to listen to web services requests or responses.
    MessageTrace  
    TransportInfo
    Super interface for all transport dependent information
    WebServiceEngine
    This interface holds all behaviour associated with the web service engine.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EndpointImpl
    Implementation of the endpoint interface
    HttpRequestInfoImpl  
    HttpResponseInfoImpl
    Implementation of the HttpResponseInfo interface
    HttpTransportInfo
    Superclass for all HTTP related transport information.
    JAXRPCEndpointImpl
    Implementation of the JAXRPC endpoint interface and JAXRPC System Handler Delegate
    JAXWSEndpointImpl  
    LogAuthenticationListener
    Log all authentication successes and failures.
    MessageTraceImpl
    An invocation trace contains the timestamp os a particular message invocation, the stringified SOAP request and response or the SOAP Faults if the invocation resulted in one.
    ThreadLocalInfo
    This class encapsulates all information contained in the thread local for servlet invocations to trace the messages.
    WebServiceEngineImpl
    This class acts as a factory to create TracingSystemHandler instances.
    WebServiceStatsProvider
    Provides statistics for Web Service endpoints.
    WebServiceTesterServlet
    This servlet is responsible for testing web-services.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EndpointType
    Defines an endpoint implementation type
    TransportType
    Defines the possible transport type for an endpoint
